name: Student
text: Summer here is so relaxed. Have you been to any of the summer concerts in Lafayette?

name: You
text: Not yet, but I've been meaning to check them out. Are they any good?

name: Student
text: Yeah, theyâ€™re a lot of fun! Great music and food trucks too.

name: You
text: That sounds awesome. I'll definitely go to the next one. Thanks for the tip!
